input.sentences: some fireworks represent the sun | for it is as bright as morning .
another represents the moon and all the dark secrets it has in store .
other fireworks shows man traveling across space into the unknown .
this fireworks was of the ocean and all the life it provides .
and last | fire for it is the flame our hearts use to go on .
output.sentences: Some say that the sun represents the morning.
I think the sun stores secrets and it represents mystery.
We're all just traveling through the unknown on a big rock in space
There's something about the ocean and fireworks that make you think about life
The fire in my heart went down in flames.
